metadata.Title: CVE-2022-28189 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: NVIDIA GPU Display Driver for Windows contains a vulnerability in the kernel mode layer (nvlddmkm.sys) handler for DxgkDdiEscape, where a NULL pointer dereference may lead to a system crash.

notes.Note: sbeattie> only affects windows drivers mdeslaur> some binary drivers are no longer support by NVidia, so they are marked as ignored here
